name: Omastar
author: Shin-ichi Yoshida
flavor_text: Apparently, it cracked Shellder’s shell with its sharp fangs and sucked out the insides.

attacks.name: Squeeze
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 20 more damage and the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed. If tails, this attack does 10 damage.

attacks.name: Spike Barrage
attacks.effect: Flip a number of coins equal to the number of {W} Energy attached to Omastar. This attack does 20 damage plus 20 more damage for each heads.
